summary: When an obstetrician learns that his wife has been unfaithful to him with all three of his best mates, he decides to leave London for a short while to think about what to do next.
cast: Martin Clunes|Dominic Rowan|Richard Dillane|Oliver Fox|Mathew Bose|Christopher Pizzey|Debbie Norman|Lynsey Baxter|Mark Heap|Tristan Sturrock|Tony Maudsley|Paul Brooke|Stephen Moore|Rosie Ede|Barbara Lott|Roger Frost|Neve McIntosh|Archie Preston|Roger Booth|Jeremy Child|Howard Coggins|Crispin Payne|Tony Bayliss|Sally Edwards|Amanda Abbington|Sidney Kean
title: Doc Martin
